children.subject: CS major declarations are included in the "administrative projects" we will be working on during this closure. The CS major declaration deadline is May 30th and we plan to begin processing applications after that deadline. Thank you for your patience.

Will this closure in any way affect CS major declarations applications from being processed? I am wondering because I have been waiting for the last grade I need to meet the declaring GPA to post, and hoping to set my fall schedule as soon as possible as I am currently on a lot of waitlists.

history.content:
Dear Students,

Starting Monday, May 24th, we will be unavailable for appointments through June 16th, so that we can focus on administrative projects. This does NOT apply to ESS Advising. ESS Advisors will still be available for appointments during that period of time.
**CS and EECS Advisors will still be available via email during this time, so please contact us at cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu or eecs-advising@eecs.berkeley.edu.**
Appointments via CalCentral for CS students, and youcanbook.me for EECS students will resume on Thursday, June 17th.
We hope you are getting a well-deserved break after finals!
-CS and EECS Advisors
